cookingMethod:
1. Preheat oven to 425°F. 
2. Roll out pizza dough and place on a baking sheet. 
3. Spread tomato sauce on top of the dough. 
4. Add shredded mozzarella cheese, pepperoni, and sliced mushrooms. 
5. Bake in preheated oven for 12-15 minutes or until cheese is melted and crust is golden brown.

1. Cook rice according to package instructions. 
2. In a wok or large skillet, heat sesame oil over high heat. 
3. Add garlic and ginger and stir-fry for 1-2 minutes until fragrant. 
4. Add sliced chicken breast and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes until browned. 
5. Add chopped broccoli, carrots, and bell peppers and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until slightly softened. 
6. Add soy sauce and cook for another minute. 
7. Serve over rice.

1. Preheat oven to 375°F. 
2. In a medium bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, and salt. 
3. In a separate large bowl, cream together butter, brown sugar, and granulated sugar until light and fluffy. 
4. Beat in egg and vanilla extract. 
5. Gradually mix in the flour mixture. 
6. Fold in chocolate chips. 
7. Drop spoonfuls of cookie dough onto a baking sheet. 
8. Bake in preheated oven for 8-10 minutes or until golden brown.
